name: 月光下的冒险-Moonlight Adventure
description:
Come build your deck! The game incorporates a lot of roguelike elements. In many random levels, you will use skills and methods such as cards and runes to inject more energy into yourself and defeat monsters.

Under the moonlight, at the end of your destiny, you will uncover the final mystery, rush into the wilderness, and finally make your way to the Pilgrimage Hall. There are many different duel gameplays in the game. Here you have to challenge different tasks to get the final reward. More experience is to strengthen your strength. There are many levels of different difficulty here. Be brave enough to challenge them and eliminate them better. This will be a very wonderful experience.

Adventure in the dark world, defeat all evil monsters, perfect fighting skills, a variety of weapons and props waiting for you to use. Discover the secrets in the map, there are various treasures deep in the dungeon, and complete the trials again and again, taking you on an endless adventure.
